dcterms:creator: W.-L. Zheng
B.-L. Lu
dcterms:description: A large dataset for vigilance estimation collected from 23 participants, where both EEG and EOG data were recorded while participants drove a simulated car in a virtual environment for around 120 minutes. The dataset includes EEG channels from various brain regions and EOG channels from the forehead, with vigilance scores calculated based on eye movements.
dcterms:title: SEED-VIG
